Description:
Responsibilities will include but not limited to:Assist in the management of civil works to support drilling and testing operations.
Be able to work unsupervised and competently execute basic to detailed Scope of Works as set out by the civil works supervisor.
Be able to generate and submit daily field progress reports to management.
Be able to competently estimate resources required for field civil works operations.
Provide the civil works department with any required administrative support.
Work closely with Company’s civil works contractors to ensure that the works are performed in compliance with Company HSE standards and completed to a level that is acceptable.
Have a strong working knowledge of civil works operations especially in desert locations.
Have good working relationship with Company's supervisors and all civil works contractors.
Will be required to assist in scouting operations in challenging desert conditions.
The job is primarily field based either commuting from Abu Dhabi or living in on site in field camp.RequirementsMinimum educationrequired3+ years’ experience working in the UAE.
English spoken and written skills.
Knowledge of MS Office Suite, including Outlook, Word, and Excel.
Current UAE driving licence.Job Details
